sub_title: Freelance copy editor and Dutch-English translator
summary:
I'm a freelance copy editor and Dutch-English translator with more than 10 years' experience of working on books, newspapers, online news and websites.

I have provided Dutch-English translations for books including Surf & Stay by Veerle Helsen and Maps That Made History by Martijn Storms (Uitgeverij Lannoo), as well as for Centraal Museum Utrecht and Amnesty International Nederland.

As a copy editor or sub editor, I have worked with publishers including *Research (Research Professional News), the European Association for International Education, The Guardian, The Open University, Bradt Travel Guides and The Non-League Football Paper.

I'm currently also project manager for the National Talent Academy, overseeing the creation of courses and qualifications, having gained previous project management experience with SAM Learning.
